text: Dude, that's retardo's line.

name: saint
text: yeah, no kidding. maybe he finally realized it's kinda pointless to post since everyone just lames him off the map.

name: johnnyrocker
text: Teodor is, at most, bi-curious. Or possibly full-on bisexual.

name: lastlarf
text: One of my favourite storylines. Can't say why exactly. It's very silly but at the same time quite believable.

name: anomalous3
text: Teodor is not gay. All evidence suggests that he likes picking fruits from both side of the orchard

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Conceded.

name: berami
text: And a metaphor worth reusing. Chubbied.

name: chaesar
text: It's not Teodor's fault, Ray installed the "Horny Hiram" expansion pack. It's the new Oregon Trail, where 'Oregon' is a metaphor for 'asshole'

name: stuart
text: Organ Trail

name: mattylite
text: Still not as good as the original Oregon Tail...

name: libelandslander

name: libelandslander
text: In retrospect I do not know why I felt the need to say this, Portland is a pretty gosh-dang cool place which I miss living in sometimes.

name: nurdbot
text: Don't do it Teodor! He has Syphilis!

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i suspect this is a trap not unlike that found in EA's 1982 classic Wasteland , wherein one can get Wasteland Herpes from the three-legged prostitute.

name: hexjumper
text:
1988, dude, not 1982. I'm old, but I ain't that old.

name: sprog
text: little known gay fact:  just because two people are gays, they do not have to be gay at or in each other (especially when one of them hates pat and the other one is pat)

name: charchar
text: Chubbied for your use of prepositions with the verb "to be gay."

name: trollcollins
text: The International Council of Gays even included this information in recent editions of the Gay Agenda.

text:
Where is your shame.

did you lose it

name: heccibiggs
text: Oww owww this made me laugh while drinking some water which then sort of went up my nose like it does when you go swimming and now my sinuses hurt you fucker

name: norsef
text: You're welcome.

name: puguglypress
text: Right. There's always options

name: puguglypress
text: GODDAMMIT FUCK I was trying to reply to sprog's comment by linking to a Chucklebot strip! Now I'm replying to daidai with BBCode nonsense. I SWEAR THIS WAS SUPPOSED TO MAKE SENSE

name: homeskool
text: Teodor is simply doing what all inquisitive, living stuffed animals do. Besides, blacksmiths are very seductive people. You try smashing stuff with a hammer all day and see if you don't get randy.

name: steerpike66
text: Don't anybody DARE fix Theodore up with Pat. Hiram may only be a few packets of code but he's ten times the man that Pat is.

name: semiquaver
text: Obviously this says more about Pat than it does about Hiram.

name: deusoma
text: Because you wrote "Theodore", I am now picturing Alvin and Simon's younger brother in a relationship with Pat. I hate this mental image with a firey passion normally reserved for the love a man has for a woman.

name: nokococo
text: Dude, you have seen 1337 comics.  This makes me happy in a very sad, geeky way.

name: plezure
text: mmmmmmmmmmm

name: apocowarg
text: looks like Hiram the Blacksmith spends his off-time at The Peppermint Honcho.

name: spinynorman
text:
I can never take a guy named "Hiram" seriously again.

Like I could before or something.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Coconut rum's fierce wrath strikes again.

name: erinye
text:
Damn you, you stole my observation.

With tropical juices , no less. I'm basically not sure I want to know the original source of stated juices.

name: tekende
text: Tropical fruits, obviously.

name: farqussus
text: A tropical fruit named Pico, who works at the Peppermint Honcho.

name: qeramah
text: i'm thinkin Hiram makes rude iron doilies for his couch.

name: xi
text: You can totally feel that moment of pregnant silence pushing on your brain before the quick, high-pitched "That's cool!" (Yes, it would be high-pitched even though it's typed, shut up.)

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i almost chubbied this...but the phrase 'pregnant silence' steered me away.

i am sorry about this, xi.

name: xi
text: Come on, it's not like pregnant with babies or anything. It's pregnant with hilarity, and Teodor very soon gives birth to a crazy tap-dancing creature of awesome.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: you got me. creatures of awesome are chubby worthy.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: wait, no they are not.

name: charchar
text: I dunno, that seems like a shame parade to kiss somebody and they respond with 'That's cool."  Like, "Your smooches are acceptable but only vaguely neat."

name: greenkoolayd
text: like when you you tell someone you love them and all they say is thanks.

name: hereward
text: I think the unexpected kiss sent him into a rush of surprise emotions, and he did not know how to respond at all, only with 'that's cool' - Hiram recognised this instantly and knew his loving was on.

name: deovalente
text: I'm not gay, but if that line came up when playing Oregon Trail, I'd SO respond the same way.

name: goddessdictator
text: I'm baffled by the lack of love for the alt text here. its sheer brilliance make this even better. because after all it shows Hiram's TRUE love for what he thinks is Ray. all of those drinks? he had to coconut infuse them HIMSELF.

name: cleanfatback
text: this bothers me just a little bit because i own oregon trail and you have to buy oxen not horses

name: greenkoolayd
text: if the lack of political correctness doesnt bother you, then why should the lack of historical correctness?

name: farqussus
text: not all corectnesses are created equal

name: shrewbie
text: I imagine this to be Teodor giving his permission to gays everywhere
